original_title: Miles from the ocean, there’s incredible diving beneath the streets of Budapest | CNN
article_summary: "Beneath Budapest's Lukács Thermal Baths lies a hidden world: Molnár János Cave, one of the largest active thermal water caves open to certified cave divers. Carved by geothermal springs over millennia, it offers spacious chambers and gentle currents, but requires proper training due to its dark, fragile environment."</s>
